channel.title: [help] animating
channel.description:
mmk well i feel like getting into animating now after adding tons of un animated 520+ npcs to my 317, and also some items, i was jw, for example if the item was 44k+ model + uhm like lets saaaay, flame gloves or w.e, the gloves u get also with the adze, do i have to do anything special to get rid of the animation that may b already on it, or would i simply just start animating the gloves, save .dat it and add it to my serv? :0 if possible, could i also get the link to the tutorial on animating so i can get the meta add on :0
thx a ton, mike
